channel.title: [Delta 317] How to add chaotic weapons?
channel.description: I am wondering if anyone can give me a tut. to add chaotic weapon to a 317 delta guide, with the ints, models, etc... Dont give me http://google.com because i looked all over it for about 30 minutes. If so can you please give me a link to a guide. It would be very helpful. Dont Give Me GOOGLE.COM... i looked all over it did not help..

item.title: [Delta 317] How to add chaotic weapons?
item.dc:creator: @bibbobbib bibbobbib
item.description:
@bibbobbib wrote:

a simple way to do this would be to find a model add it to your server. go to the item.cfg copy and paste the format above change the itemid and the item name, stats ect. then go to class.java search for a weapon in your server
if(i == 57780){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Weild”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1];
class8.anInt174 = 101;//item look
class8.anInt181 = 1957;
class8.anInt190 = 498;
class8.anInt198 = 484;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = -1;
class8.anInt194 = -1;
class8.anInt165 = 57780; //item model male wearing
class8.anInt200 = 57784; //item model female wearing
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.aString170 = “Korasi’s Sword”; //item name
class8.aByteArray178 = “A void knight’s sword”.getBytes(); //examine
}
should look something like. then change it accordingly
then login add the model should be something like ::addmodel 12342 or something then do ::pickup (itemname ect)
then it should work if you have any questions search on google for adding models to a rsps
thats all i can say. thanks

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta 317] How to add chaotic weapons?
item.dc:creator: @Mayhem2 Mayhem,
item.description:
@Mayhem2 wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:2, topic:395062”]Add the model in the models folder
Add the init in the client class8
Type addmodel id ingame
Spawn the id and your done.

I know mopar has a tut for adding models. That is where I learned.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta 317] How to add chaotic weapons?

item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:2, topic:395062”]Add the model in the models folder
Add the init in the client class8
Type addmodel id ingame
Spawn the id and your done.

I know mopar has a tut for adding models. That is where I learned.[/quote]
This plus pm me if you need all the server side parts, I have all of it. But you also need Preloading Models for Chaotics.
